description: Compute chance of seeing satellite trails in HST images
instructions: Based on your previous results using the HST_observations_satellite_trail_classifications.csv dataset, complete the following tasks: Calculate the chance of seeing a satellite trail in the HST images by normalizing with the exposure time and scaling the FoV of ACS/WFC and WFC3/UVIS for the time periods 2009-2020 vs 2021. Return the results in a list [chance_ACS_WFC_pre2020, chance_WFC3_UVIS_pre2020, chance_ACS_WFC_post2021, chance_WFC3_UVIS_post2021].
